description.value:
A spirit of battle dwells within your armaments. Select one weapon or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.FNDq4NFSN0g2HKWO]{Handwraps of Mighty Blows} when you make your daily preparations. In your hands, the item gains the effect of a property rune. For a champion following the tenets of good, choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hnbbqvzYDyhDiJnf]{Bane}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LwQb7ryTC8FlOXgX]{Vitalizing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qlunQzfnzPQpMG6U]{Returning}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.roeYtwlIe65BPMJ1]{Shifting}. If you are a champion following the tenets of evil, you can choose the following property runes: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.P6v2AtJw7AUwaDzf]{Fearsome}, returning, or shifting. You also gain the weapon's critical specialization effect.
